data.description_html:
As animate wood, but you can only animate a Small or smaller quantity of fire.
Animated fire deals fire damage equal to its slam damage (with no Strength penalty), has the burn special attack of a fire elemental (save DC 11), and the fire subtype.
Material Component: A handful of charcoal, sulfur, and soda ash.
data.name: Animate Fire
data.target: Up to a 3-ft. cube of fire
